reference.title: A view is closed
reference.shortdesc: A view that I need is not displayed.

refbody.section: ProblemYou closed the view, perhaps in order to focus on the DITA map.

SolutionTo open a view, click Window Show Viewview_name
where view_name is one of the following items:
Bird's Eye View
DITA Topic File Manager
Method Exponent
Navigator
Outline
Properties
Properties Table
Property Visualization
Relationship Rows Browser
Relationship Table Editor
